event.title: Early Bird Gets the Worm!
event.description: We will be opening the gates early at 8am and kids from 8am to 9am receive FREE entry, bring your camera for photo with an animal ambassador. Reservations are required.

event.title: Expedition Transport "Your ride to the Wildside"
event.description: This is a three hour guided excursion that provides a ride out to Wildlife Images Rehabilitation and Education Center on the Expedition Transport and an exciting and educational tour of our facility. The Transport departs from several locations in downtown Grants Pass.

event.title: Camp EEK!
event.description: In 2012, Wildlife Images will be hosting its 7th annual summer camp- Camp EEK! Designed for children between the ages of 7 and 11, this year’s curriculum will focus on nocturnal animals, marine life, ecosystems, and interdependence. Participants will not only enjoy a variety of engaging lessons, creative crafts, and exciting games, but they will also have the opportunity to get up-close and personal with a number of our wild animal residents- including several new furry additions! Join us this summer for a memorable and educational wildlife adventure!

event.title: Southern Oregon Experience II: Wine Maker’s Dinner at Troon Vineyard and Brunch by Taprock at Wildlife Images
event.description: Wine Maker’s Dinner at Troon Vineyard ~ June 23rd: 6pm to 9:30pm and Brunch by Taprock at Wildlife Images June ~ 24th: 10am to 2pm. Tickets $100.00 for both days. This year we are having a unique and spectacular winemakers’ dinner where all of our guest will not only enjoy the culinary pleasures of Chef Tim they will also enjoying the meal in the company of some of the Wildlife Images Animal Ambassadors. Day two, we will once more enjoy the culinary talents of Taprock at the place we all love "Wildlife Images."

event.title: Great Garage Sale
event.description: June 29th and 30th 8:00am to 2:00pm The Great Garage Sale at Wildlife Images. Find that unique treasure at The Great Garage Sale. All income goes to Wildlife Images.

event.title: Fire Awareness Days
event.description: June 29th and 30th 10:00am to 2:00pm Fire Awareness Days at Wildlife Images Presentations given by local Rural/Metro Fire Department. Meet your local heroes, listen to presentations and learn how to be fire safe. Free Event!

event.title: Junior Volunteer Program (JVP)
event.description: The Wildlife Images Rehabilitation and Education Center JVP is an opportunity for young teenagers interested in working with wildlife. Find out what it means to actually care for these animals every day, and learn what it feels like to help critters in need. Along the way, you’ll gain new knowledge and skills, and create experiences you’ll remember for the rest of your life. The Junior Volunteer Program is designed for 13-15 year old young adults. It’s a week-long program, Monday through Friday, from 8:00 am – 12:00 pm each day.

event.title: Family Gone Wild Camp Out!
event.description: August 18th and August 25th Family Gone Wild Camp Out! Camp out on the lawn. Get a special visit from some of our Animal Ambassadors. You also get to experience some behind-the-scenes areas. Make an enrichment treat for your selected animal. Includes dinner, snacks and campfire with stories. Awaken with the animals and to a continental breakfast. A special morning tour wraps up this memorable event. All Ages Welcome!

event.title: Family Gone Wild Camp Out!
event.description: August 18th and August 25th Family Gone Wild Camp Out! Camp out on the lawn. Get a special visit from some of our Animal Ambassadors. You also get to experience some behind-the-scenes areas. Make an enrichment treat for your selected animal. Includes dinner, snacks and campfire with stories. Awaken with the animals and to a continental breakfast. A special morning tour wraps up this memorable event. All Ages Welcome!

event.title: Seniors Going Wild!
event.description: Celebrating Grandparents Day Seniors are invited to explore Wildlife Images with a weekend of free admission. Must be over 65, if you look over 20 you will be carded! Reservations are required.

event.title: Veteran's Weekend
event.description: Honoring Those who Have Served Our Country Veterans are invited to explore Wildlife Images with a weekend of free admission. Reservations are required.

event.title: Holiday Open House
event.description: Wildlife Images fourth annual Holiday Open House The event will feature ½ price tours of the sanctuary, refreshments, and a unique selection of Holiday gifts for every wildlife lover. You can ‘adopt’ one of our animals and enter the raffle to win a life-sized stuffed toy bear. And the best part, all proceeds go directly towards keeping our resident birds and animals warm, fed, and healthy.

event.title: Family and Friends Days
event.description: Save 30% on everything in the Wildlife Images Gift Shop and enter to win a $50.00 Wildlife Images Rehabilitation and Education Gift Certificate. And the best part, all proceeds go directly towards keeping our resident birds and animals warm, fed, and healthy.
